name: Roider Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct designs and modifications developed by the Roider Union.

name: Base Ship Retrofit Template
desc: Describes a streamlined process for heavy industry to directly construct the given converted ship hull. Requires blueprints for at least one source hull.

name: Union HQ Blueprint
desc: Contains the technological specifications needed to construct a planet-side industry or structure.

name: Rockpiper Shipworks Blueprint
desc: Contains the technological specifications needed to construct a planet-side industry or structure.
